text: Club Puebla (formerly "Puebla F.C.")Puebla FC cambiará de escudo y de nombre; se llamará Club Puebla, Diario Cambio, 11 May 2016 is a Mexican football club from Puebla, Mexico, competing in the Liga MX. The team's white home jersey features its iconic blue sash, which crosses the chest diagonally from the right shoulder to the waist (see uniform diagrams, at right). ==Honors== *Mexican Primera
